The clinical's time series analysis

Source: R/pCliTS.R
pCliTS.Rd

The clinical's time series analysis

Usage

pCliTS(clinical, marker)

Arguments

clinical

the clinical marker of different time, and need included "time","group",maker; "high"and "low" are alternative.

marker

the marker of clinical, default is 'marker'

Value

Figure

Examples

time_series_ALT <- pCliTS(clinical_index)
time_series_ALT
#> `geom_smooth()` using formula = 'y ~ x'
